1.content:
Jonathan (you) look through the job section for a saturday job or anything that gives money as you need it for the rent when you come across a section that says:

Test subject needed for experiment
will take anyone
Will offer 2,000,000 credits
Go to pokelabs and tell receptionist about the job

The amount of money they were giving was what caught your attention so you head out of your apartment and head for the labs.

You enter the reception of the labs and you walk to the main desk and you tell the blastoise pokemorph about the job. The blastoise then gets up and takes you to one of the labs.

Inside there are numerous pokemorphs in lab coats doing all sorts of experiments.
"Excuse me, i'm here for the ad in the paper." you say to the scientists.
One of them turns to you. It is a male Raichu pokemorph. "Very well come this way please." You follow the raichu to a seperate office where he tells you to sit in a chair. He then gets a syringe full of a blue liquid.

"This is a prototype solution. So far we don't know what it does but if you experience any symptoms, please call the labs and ask for Dr. Thompson." Dr Thompson says and injects you with the liquid. You flinch a little but it didn't hurt that much.

"Thank you for your cooperation. You can collect your money from the main reception." Dr. Thompson says and you leave, collecting the money from the reception in the process.

You go back to your apartment and place the money in a small safe under your bed.

You then decide to go to your girlfriends house.

You leave your apartment and head to your girlfriends house but on the way you feel a little warm.

You knock on the door and your girlfriends mother opens the door and tells you michelle is in her room. You get up and go into her room where she is on her bed reading a magazine.

She looks up and sees you. "Jonathan, Hi!" She gets up and hugs you at the door. "where have you been then?"
You tell her about the lab and the money earned.
"Wow, they must have been desperate to give that much away. So have you experienced anything yet?" Michelle asked.
"Only that I'm warm, (panting and fanning yourself) could you get me some water please?" You ask. "Sure, you stay there, I'll be back in a minute." Michelle says going to the kitchen. You sit down on the bed and feel like your melting. You look at your hand and you realise you are, but into a blue ooze. Michelle enters the room with some water and sees you melting on her bed. She yells for her parents, her parents enter and see you melting into a pile of ooze on michelles bed.

You melt into a pile of ooze and pass out. You feel someones hands scoop you up and bring you to their muzzle, they accidently breathe you in and they lose conciousness for a moment. In the body you feel yourself spread in the body.

When you open your eyes and see above you:
1.title: The ad in the paper

choices: Take a shower in Michelles body
Call the lab and tell the doctor what happened
Try and get out of Michelles body
11.content:
You open your eyes after a minute and you see Michelles parents looking at you.

"Are you ok, honey?" Michelles mother asked.

You think "Wait, Michelles mother only calls Michelle honey, what is going on?"
You look down at yourself and are slightly shocked. You see a pair of breasts on your chest covered in black and white fur with a tank top on top. You bring yourself up a little and see a pair of feminine jeans on your legs with a pair of mightyena feet at the end.

"Honey, are you ok?" Michelles mother asks again. You turn to her and you nod.

"Ok, we'll be downstairs if you need us" Michelles mother tells you and she and Michelles father leave the room.

You get up and you walk over to a full body mirror that Michelle has. You look in the mirror and you don't see yourself but Michelle looking back at you. You stand there shocked and raise your hand to the mirror and Michelle does the same in the mirror.

You look down and see Michelles breasts on your chest.

What do you do now?
11.title: Michelle's mother and father above you

choices: Suddenly, you feel Michelle controlling your body.
113.content:
You look at yourself cautiously. Michelle was in you, somewhere. Or, no, you were in her. Was she still conscious? Could she feel you controlling her? Or was she asleep? You carefully touch your face. You could feel your muzzle, which made you shiver. You were, for all intents and purposes, a fully female Michelle.

You glance around her room. You're not sure how to reverse this, but you need to call the doctor and explain what's going on. Assuming you don't sound crazy, which you undoubtedly will. You practically lunge for the phone and dial his number.

Brrrrrrrrr......brrrrrrrrr......brrrrrr....
113.title: Call the lab and tell the doctor what happened

choices: Take a rest on michelles bed
Call the doctor and tell him what happened
114.content:
You wonder how on earth you got in Michelles body but you need to figure out how to get out of her body.

You lay down on her bed and try to remember what happened. You remember melting into a pile of blue ooze on michelles bed, michelle yelled for her parents, you became a pile of blue ooze, you could not see or hear that well as an ooze and michelle must have scooped you up to examine what you became, she accidently breathed you in and you somehow got control of her body.

You suddenly get an idea. You try and focus on being the ooze again and as you do this, michelles body starts to act like its choking and rolls onto its side. You feel yourself becoming the ooze and you are making your way out of her throat and onto her bed. You fall to the floor and feel yourself morph back to your normal, human form. Michelle slowly wakes up and sees you morph back to normal.

"John, you're ok?" michelle asks while a little shocked "what happened?"

"I'm not entirely sure myself. First I remember melting into a pile of ooze on your bed and you calling for your parents, then there was a little blurred patch and the next thing I know, I was in control of your body." you tell michelle.

"Well, I remember scooping you up when you were the ooze and I brought you up to my muzzle to examine you and I accidently breathed you in and everything else is a blur. I guess that was when you were in control of my body." michelle replies. "I hope you didn't do anything silly in my body." michelle says jokingly.

"No, I was wondering what was going to and I want to see your body when you are ready to anyway" you tell her. "Well thats good to know" michelle tells you. "So do you want anything to eat?" michelle asks.

"Yeah, could I have a toasted sandwich please?" you ask michelle.

"Sure, I'll do your favourite." michelle says and she leaves the room for the kitchen.

What do you do while waiting for the sandwich?
114.title: Try and get out of Michelles body

1141.content:
You decide to take a rest on michelles bed as she takes a while to do one toasted sandwich.

You lay down on her bed and slowly close your eyes. As you are resting, you get a clear image of michelle in your head so you decide to focus on it and as you focus on the image in your head, you feel a little warm.

You wake up and reach for the water michelle brought before you took control of her body and as you do, you notice something wrong with your arm. Your arm is now covered in black and white fur. You get up and go over to michelles mirror. You look in the mirror and you see michelle staring back at you.

"Wait, why am-" you start to say until you realise your voice sounds like michelle. "Why am I michelle, I thought I was out of her body."

You close your eyes and hope you are dreaming. As you open your eyes, you are looking at the sandwich toaster in michelles kitchen.

You suddenly think, "wait, first I was michelle in her room, why am I now in her kitchen?" As you are thinking about this, you hear the sandwich toaster beep stating it is finished. You then hear michelle say "Finally, this thing takes forever to toast. Mum should really get a new one of these things." You then see michelles hands reach toward the toaster and open it up and remove the sandwich and the weird thing is, michelle accidently burnt her finger on the toaster and you felt the same burn in the same spot on the same finger.

You close your eyes again and you are back seeing yourself as michelle in front of her mirror and put your finger in the glass to cool it down from the burn. You wonder if this is another side effect from the stuff you were injected with.

The door opens and michelle enters with the sandwich and is suprised to see herself standing in front of the mirror.

"John, is that you?" michelle asks the copy of herself in front of her mirror.

"Yeah, it's me." you say to michelle, in her voice.

"Why do you look and sound like me? michelle asked.

"I don't know. I was resting on your bed and there was a clear image of you in my head, so I decided to focus on it and when I woke up, I reached for the water you brought up earlier and saw that I was you." you tell her.

"Do you think you should call that doctor and tell him whats going on?" michelle asks you

"Good idea!" you say, going towards the phone.

"Wait a minute!" michelle says "maybe you should turn back to normal first."

"Yeah, you're right." you say so you concentrate on becoming yourself again. You look at your arm and it morphs back to normal along with the rest of you.

Once normal, you phone the labs.

Is the doctor in?
1141.title: Take a rest on michelles bed

11411.content:
"Hello, is Dr. Thompson in?" you ask the receptionist.

"Yes in fact he just passed me. Dr. Thompson, you have a call" the receptionist says.

"Thank you, Dr. Thompson speaking." Dr Thompson says.

"Hi, this is the human that you saw earlier" you say.

"Ah yes, I remember. So did you have any side effects from that injection I gave you earlier?"

"Actually, yes I did!"

"Really, what were they?"

"I doubt you would believe me if I told you."

"Try me."

"Well, here's what happened. After I left the lab, I went home and stored the money I got. Then I went to my girlfriends home and felt a little warm on the way."

"Ok that seems normal"

"Well while inside my girlfriends home, I was getting warmer and while my girlfriend left the room, I was melting into a pile of blue ooze. She came back and saw me melting. She called her parents who also saw me melt. As I melted, I passed out. Afterwards, my girlfriend picked me up and accidently breathed me in and she passed out. After that happened I woke up but I had sort of possessed her body"

"Hmmm interesting" Dr. Thompson said "What happened after that?"

"Well after I woke up in her body, I tried getting out of her body and I did and managed to reform back into myself."

"Ok ok fair enough, then what happened?"

"Later, my girlfriend went to make a snack and I layed down on her bed. As I napped, I saw a clear image of her in my head and I focused on it. When I woke up, I saw that I had somehow morphed into my girlfriend and I could see through her eyes at her sandwich toaster and I could hear her talking as well and that's all."

"Interesting, very interesting. I think I would like to see these abilities for myself. Is there a place where we can meet up?" Dr Thompson asked.

"Well we can meet up at my home, I live at 42 Vine Avenue." you tell Dr. Thompson.

"Ah, I know that area, so I will see you in around 20 minutes then, cherrio." Dr. Thompson says and hangs up.
11411.title: The doctor is open for business

choices: You see someone you know on the way
114111.content:
"So what's going on then?" Michelle asked you.

"Well he is going to meet me at my place to discuss these 'abilities' I have" you say.

"Fair enough" Michelle says.

"Do you want to come with me to my place and see the doctor? Its just he may need a witness to truly believe me" you ask Michelle.

"Yeah sure!" Michelle says cheerfully.

"Thank you my beautiful puppy" you say lovingly to Michelle while stroking her and scratching her behind her ear.

"Hey that tickles!" Michelle says giggling.

"This may seem a bit sudden, but is it ok if I possess you and walk you over to my place just so the doctor can see it working?" you ask her.

"You really can't keep your hands off me can you?" Michelle says "But yes you can"

"Thank you" you say as you melt into the pile of ooze except this time you are conscious and can see in 360 degrees. Michelle then scoops you up and places you in her mouth. You then slide down her throat and quickly take control of her body.

You then leave her house and walk to yours, feeling Michelle's tail wag in anticipation.
114111.title: Time to meet with the doctor again

1141111.content: As you were slightly thankful that you didn't run into anyone in Michelle's body, you finally arrive at your apartment. as you approach the main door, you notice that:
1141111.title: An uneventful trip

choices: You decide to exit Michelle right there
You slowly reveal your true identity
11411111.content:
As you got closer to your place, you are relieved to see Dr Thompson waiting outside.

When you got closer to your front door, Dr Thompson notices you coming towards him.

"Hi there, are you this Dr Thompson I've heard about?" you ask him in Michelle's voice, knowing full well that he is.

"Yes I am young miss and can I ask who you are?" Dr Thompson asked.

"I'm Michelle, girlfriend of the human that visited you earlier today" you said to him.

"I take it he told you about what happened at the lab. If your here to see him as well, he isn't in at the moment and I've been here for about 5 minutes so far" Dr Thompson tells you.

"Don't worry, I have a key" you tell him.

You unlock the door and lead Dr Thompson into the living room.
11411111.title: Finally a doctor that makes house calls

choices: Dr Thompson runs some tests and talks about the injection
114111111.content:
"Make yourself comfy" you say.

"Very well" Dr Thompson said sitting down on the settee.

"Let me just bring Jonathan up for you" you say to him.

"What do you mean?" Dr Thompson asked.

As he said that you decided to exit Michelle's body and she falls to the floor on all fours coughing as she does.

"Are you ok?" Dr Thompson said sounding worried, getting to the area where Michelle was.

Michelle finally coughed you out and then passed out on the floor. You moved away from her mouth area in your goo form and reform in front of Dr Thompson. Dr Thompson stands there in shock.

"Good to see you again Dr Thompson" you say to him.

"How...but...what...?" Dr Thompson started stuttering.

"You remember the phone call and what I said?" you asked.

"Well yes but I originally thought you were joking!" Dr Thompson said.

As you two were talking, Michelle started to stir.

"ugh......What happened? Michelle asked.

You explain what happened to Michelle and she seems ok with it.

"Well at least you kept control of yourself in me" Michelle joked at you.
114111111.title: You decide to exit Michelle right there

1141112.content: As you walked Michelle to your home, you encounter someone you recognise. But who is it?
1141112.title: You see someone you know on the way

11412.content:
"Hello, is Dr Thompson there?" you ask.

"I'm terribly sorry, but I'm afraid Dr Thompson only left a short while ago" the receptionist tells you.

"Seriously?"

"Yes, and he won't be back in til tomorrow morning. If you want i could book an appointment for you for tomorrow."

" That would be great, but I have college tomorrow and I won't get home til after you shut."

"Oh, well is there a suitable time for me to place an appointment?"

"Well I do have a half day on wednesday so can I book in at half 2 on wednesday?"

"Yes, that should be fine. Goodbye."

"Thank you, goodbye" you say to the receptionist and you put the phone down.

"So what's going on?" Michelle said.

You turn to her and say "well there's some good news and some bad news. The bad news is that the doctor was not in the labs, the good news is that I booked an appointment with him for wednesday so I can tell him what happened."

"Well, at least its something." michelle says. "Say, could you morph back into me for a sec?" michelle asks.

"What do you have planned?" you curiously ask michelle.

"I just want to see how i look in the clothes I have, plus I want to see you in my bikini as well" michelle tells you.

"Well, alright" you say as you transform into michelle, right in front of her eyes.

Michelle is a little shocked at you transforming into her, but she quickly recovers and hands you:
11412.title: The doctor has left the building

114121.content:
A T-shirt and jeans. "Well, at least it's subtle.", you told Michelle as you putted them on.

You looked in the mirror to see Michelle's body wearing a baggy T-shirt that nearly covered the fact that she had breasts, while wearing a pair of jeans that fitted your (or rather her) body snugly. "We've got a big day tomorrow, John.", Michelle told you as the two of you fell asleep in her bed.
114121.title: a T-shirt and some jeans

114122.content:
Michelle quickly looks through one of her draws and pulls out a light blue bikini that you have seen her in on the beach many a time.

"Lets see how I really look in this" she says as she passes the bikini to you, "also, shopping for clothes will be easier with you there".

You suddenly shudder as the thought of being dragged into every clothes shop in town trying on every bit of clothing in stock seeps into your head.

You then see michelle looking completly shocked.

"What?" you ask in her voice.

"Your clothes changed about 5 times in the space of a minute" michelle said, confusing you.

"What do you mean changed?" "Your clothes morphed into different clothes while you were lost in your head"

You go to her mirror and concentrated. When you looked in the mirror again, your clothes had changed just like michelle said.

"Well that is a new feature" You say and decide to morph back into yourself.

"Do you think we should tell the others about this?" michelle asked.

"Yeah, but lets suprise them. Call the others and tell them to meet at the usual location at college tomorrow. You wait with them and I will arrive as you and get them confused. Then I will reveal myself." you said.

"Sounds like a plan." Michelle said.

"I best be getting back to my apartment and get ready for my appearance tomorrow" you say.

"Ok, I'll see you tomorrow" michelle says as she hugs you and kisses you goodbye.
114122.title: Her favourite bikini

1141221.content:
At the usual spot at the college, all of your friends are there wondering why they are here.

Round the corner, you and Michelle sneak a look to see if everyone is there.

Among the group include Tomas, Hannah, James, Arron (Lucario pokemorph), Simon (Houndoom pokemorph), Lee (Seviper pokemorph), Sarah (Grovyle pokemorph) and Carl and Claire (Latios and Latias pokemorphs).

"Looks like everyone's here" Michelle whispers.

"I best look the part then" you say and start morphing into Michelle.

After you finish morphing, Michelle walks around the corner towards the others, as she does this the others greet Michelle and keep asking what is going on.

"Ok, ok calm down, one at a time. Tomas you first" Michelle says pointing at Tomas.

"What is going on? you said something on the phone yesterday about Jonathan but you were'nt clear on the details" Tomas says

"If it involves Damian (Zangoose pokemorph) again, I swear that he will not live to see graduation" Lee says.

"Well yes I did say it involved Jonathan, but it doesn't involve Damian. The other day, Jonathan went to pokelabs for a job position which offered quite a payout but when he came to mine, he had went through a few changes" Michelle says to the group.

"What do you mean by changes?" Sarah asked

That was when you decided to walk in and see the others.

"Hi guys" you say in Michelles voice. The group suddenly looked really confused as they kept looking at you then looking at Michelle wondering how she multiplied.

"Ok I am officially confused" Simon said.

"No way" Arron says

"What is it Arron?" Carl asked.

"I just looked at both their auras and..." Arron said

"Arron please what is it?" Claire asked.

"Well..."
1141221.title: The next day

11412211.content:
"Good one Arron, but seriously what's going on?" James said.

"Dude I'm serious. One of them is Jonathan." Arron says.

"So if one of them is Jonathan, which Michelle is he?" Lee asks Arron.

"He's the Michelle on the right." Arron says.

"Seems like I've been rumbled." you say to Michelle.

"Well, it was fun while it lasted anyway." Michelle says giggling,

As she laughs, you morph back into yourself in front of a surprised crowd. When you finished, everyone swarms round you asking various questions.
How did this happen?, when did it happen?, what else can you do? along with requests to see you turn into them.

"Whoa, whoa, whoa, calm down everyone. I will answer any questions you may have, but not right now as we're almost late for class and I don't want to be responsible for you lot getting detention." you tell everyone.

"Well Ok, you can give us the details at lunch then." Hannah said.

"Ok then see you all at lunch." you say to everyone as you make your way towards your first class of the day.
11412211.title: "One of them is really Jonathan"

info.brief_description: The only human in a pokemorph world can possess and morph into them
info.description:
Jonathan was the only human in a world of anthro pokemon. He went to the local college where he was picked on for being the only human but some of them took pity on him and became friends with him also one of them became his girlfriend.

One day while browsing through the paper for a saturday job, he sees an ad for a test subject at the pokelabs.

As he needed the money, he went to the labs.

What happens when he leaves is up to you.

Characters

Jonathan (you):
22 years old
Boyfriend of Michelle

Michelle
Mightyena Pokemorph
20 years old
Became your girfriend from feeling sorry for you
Kind hearted

Tomas
Pikachu Pokemorph
21 years old
Best friend for feeling sorry for you
Can be vague at times but is smart

Hannah
Charmeleon pokemorph
22 years old
Hot headed at times otherwise a good friend

James
Manaphy pokemorph
21 years old
A bit of a jokester but a loyal friend
Fond of using heart swap to swap people into different bodies

Other characters can be added later.

You have to turn into a pile of ooze before possessing anyone and once you leave a body, you get a sample of their DNA and you can morph into them. Once you morph into the pokemorph, you can see what they see, hear what they hear and feel what they feel when you want to and the only difference is they feel what you feel and don't know what is going on.

Here are some rules:
1. use proper grammer and spelling
2. no guy on guy action
3. sex is allowed
4. have fun
